      • isInsidePoly

        public static boolean isInsidePoly(float x,
                   float y,
                   float[] xp,
                   float[] yp)
        W. Randolph Franklin - Point Inclusion in Polygon Test
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the test point.
        y - y-coordinate of the test point.
        xp - array containing the x coordinates of the polygon's vertices.
        yp - array containing the y-coordinates of the polygon's vertices.
        Returns:
        true if (x, y) inside the polygon, otherwise false.
        See Also:
        pnpoly
